description:
[Enjoy Novelmates]
Novelmates is your gateway to a romantic world of addictive novels from various genres. Dive into captivating stories, explore new plots on those web novels. With Novelmates, immerse yourself into storytelling anytime, anywhere.

[Features]
1.Extensive Library: Access a diverse library of novels spanning multiple genres, including romance, mystery, fantasy, science fiction, thriller, and more.

2.Personalized Recommendations: Discover new novels tailored to your preferences based on your favorite novels and stories.

3.Bookmarking: Bookmark your favorite novels and never lose your place in a story.

4.Night Mode: Read comfortably in low-light conditions with the night mode feature, reducing eye strain.

5.Seamless Experience: Enjoy a seamless reading experience with smooth page-turning animations and intuitive navigation controls.

6.Subscriptions: Enjoy the unlimited reading experience without interruptions after subscribing, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the story.

[Tranding Novel For You]
- Billionaire
- Werewolf
- Romance
- Badboy
- Mafia


Discover the joy of reading with Novelmates and unlock a world of good novels. Download now and start your literary journey today!

No one to recite to? No problem. Tarteel AI is here!

How many times have you wished you knew more surahs to use in salah? That you could get feedback on your recitation whenever you needed it? That you could memorize more, and worry less?

Hide. Tap. Recite. In three easy moves, you’re strengthening your memorization of the Quran with the world’s leading AI Quran memorization companion. Simply hide the verses, tap the mic and start reciting. The pages will fill with your recitation and if you make a mistake, Tarteel’s intuitive AI will be sure let you know INSTANTLY with its flagship feature, Memorization Mistake Detection. That’s live feedback on your recitation, any time, anywhere - even if you whisper! 

Whether you’re memorizing for your next Hifz class or revising Juz Amma on your daily commute, Tarteel adapts to your recitation, tracks your progress and aligns with your goals. It’s your companion —helping you memorize better, build confidence, and create a Quran habit that lasts a lifetime. No matter where you are in your memorization, Tarteel is here for the journey. 

Tarteel is free to use with no ads and prioritizes user privacy. The team operates within the framework of Ihsan, striving for excellence and using innovative tech to serve the Muslim Ummah.

TARTEEL PREMIUM

Supercharge your Quran memorization with a paid subscription to Tarteel Premium. Try it now for FREE, no credit card required. Features include:

- Memorization Mistake Detection

Start reciting and you’ll be notified whenever you miss a word, use the wrong word or say one word too many! Tarteel will highlight your mistakes and keep track so you can revise and review for next time. Currently, this feature does not include Tajweed or pronunciation correction, but we know there’s community demand and it’s on our roadmap for the future!

- Hidden Verses

Hide the verses and recite; Tarteel will highlight verses and follow along with your recitation so you can check your memorization as you go. You’re one step closer to perfecting that verse!

- Goals

Set custom Goals for what you want to memorize and revise. Choose your portion, deadline and the type of engagement you want; memorization, reading, revision or recitation!

- Historical Mistakes

Progress is key! Tarteel keeps a record of all of your mistakes so you know exactly where your memorization is strong and what could use a little more work. 

- Unlimited Listening and Audio

Solidify your memorization with listening and audio! Choose your favourite Qari, the portion and how many times you want to listen. 

- Advanced Progress Tracking

Check if you’re reaching your goals with detailed analytics around your Quran engagement. 

—

Join the 9M+ Muslims worldwide who are using Tarteel to support their memorization of the Quran!

Do you use Tarteel? Your feedback helps us improve the platform and add to our long-term roadmap. If you’ve benefited from Tarteel, please remember to leave us a review - we’d love to hear from you! Request new features here: [http://feedback.tarteel.ai](http://feedback.tarteel.ai/)

—

NOTES:
Tarteel requires microphone access and a stable internet connection in order for its voice features to function properly. Please ensure you allow Tarteel to access these permissions on your device.

Privacy Policy: https://www.tarteel.ai/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://www.tarteel.ai/terms/

From the makers of Quran.com comes Quran for iOS, a beautiful, and ad-free mushaf app. 

It’s now easier to read the Quran on the go, memorize it and listen to your favorite reciters.

This is just the beginning for Quran for iOS. We’ll be updating the app regularly insha'Allah and would love to hear your feedback and feature requests. You can reach us at ios@quran.com

As the Hadeeth (prophetic statement) in At-Tirmithi states: “Whoever reads a letter from the Book of Allah, he will have a reward, and this reward will be multiplied by ten. I am not saying that 'Alif, Laam, Meem' (a combination of letters frequently mentioned in the Holy Quran) is a letter, rather I am saying that ‘Alif’ is a letter, ‘Laam’ is a letter and ‘Meem’ is a letter.” [At-Tirmithi] We hope this app will help you increase your recitation of the Quran and increase your blessings in this world and the hereafter. 


من صناع Quran.com يأتي تطبيق القرآن للأجهزة المحمولة، تطبيق للمصحف ذو صفحات جميلة خالي تماما من الاعلانات.

لقد أصبح من السهل قراءة القرآن بالشارع، وحفظه، والاستماع إلى قارئك المفضل.

هذا هو مجرد بداية لتطبيق القرآن. سنعمل على تحديث التطبيق بشكل منتظم إن شاء الله، ونحب أن نسمع رأيك ومتطلبتك. يمكنك الوصول إلينا عن طريق البريد الإلكتروني ios@quran.com

عَنْ ابْنِ مَسْعُودٍ قَالَ : قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ { مَنْ قَرَأَ حَرْفًا مِنْ كِتَابِ اللَّهِ فَلَهُ حَسَنَةٌ وَالْحَسَنَةُ بِعَشْرِ أَمْثَالِهَا, لَا أَقُولُ الم حَرْفٌ, وَلَكِنْ أَلِفٌ حَرْفٌ, وَلَامٌ حَرْفٌ,وَمِيمٌ حَرْفٌ }. رَوَاهُ التِّرْمِذِيُّ. ونحن نأمل أن يساعدك هذا التطبيق على زيادة قراءتك للقرآن وزيادة حسناتك في الدنيا والآخرة.

Wattpad. Where stories live.
Discover the world's most-loved social storytelling platform. Wattpad connects a global community of millions of readers and writers through the power of story. Download it today to start reading or writing original stories.

Get your story discovered
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology on Wattpad. Share an original story on Wattpad and share it with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey. Think your story could be the next blockbuster? Wattpad Studios discovers untapped, unsigned, and talented writers on Wattpad and connects them to global multi-media entertainment companies.

Read original stories
Discover stories in over 25 languages from writers around the world! Whatever you’re into reading—romance, science fiction, mystery, comedy, action adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, or fanfiction—it’s all on Wattpad. So whether you’re looking for more LGBT meet-cutes, cyberpunk fairy tales, or new technothrillers to devour, you’ll find it all, and so much more, on Wattpad.

Connect with a community of story-lovers
When you join Wattpad, you become a member of an international community of story-lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly in stories as you read them, and support writers as they create and share their original stories. You can even read together and share your library or create reading lists so your friends always know what you’re reading.

Start your own free library
Save your favorite stories to keep them with you wherever you go. Hooked on a story? Simply sync your account to easily pick up where you left off, whether you’re on your laptop, tablet, Kindle or iPhone.

Read the stories that inspired blockbusters
If you’ve streamed Light as a Feather on Hulu or read New York Times best-seller Anna Todd’s series After, you may not know—these stories were first discovered on Wattpad. Join the platform the entertainment industry scours to find its next big hit, and start reading tomorrow’s box-office sensation today.

Wattpad Premium:
- Subscribe to Wattpad Premium for uninterrupted ads-free reading and first access to new features
– Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
– Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
– Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, at the cost of the chosen package
– Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- For full terms of service, visit https://www.wattpad.com/terms
- For our privacy policy, visit https://www.wattpad.com/privacy
– Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Already a Wattpad fan? Follow us on Instagram, TikTok, Facebook and Twitter to stay up-to-date on your favorite writers, stories, contests, and more!

TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wattpad
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wattpad/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wattpad

All over the world, local libraries offer millions of ebooks and audiobooks. You can borrow them — for free, instantly — with a library card and Libby: the award-winning, much-loved app for libraries. 

• Browse your library’s digital catalog of books — from classics to NYT best-sellers
• Borrow and enjoy ebooks, audiobooks, and magazines
• Download titles for offline reading, or stream them to save space
• Send ebooks to your Kindle (U.S. libraries only)
• Listen to audiobooks via Apple CarPlay
• Use tags to create your must-read list and any other book lists you want
• Keep your reading position automatically synced on all your devices 

In our beautiful, intuitive ebook reader:
• Adjust text size, background color, and book design
• Zoom into magazines and comic books
• Define and search for words and phrases
• Read and listen to read-alongs with your kids
• Add bookmarks, notes, and highlights 

In our ground-breaking audio player:
• Slow down or speed up the audio (0.6 to 3.0x)
• Set a sleep timer
• Simply swipe to skip forward and backward
• Add bookmarks, notes, and highlights 

Libby is built by the team at OverDrive, in support of local libraries everywhere. 

Happy reading!

Unlock a world of endless manga possibilities with Manga Reader - the ultimate manga reading app for true fans! With a vast library of manga titles to choose from, you'll never run out of new stories to discover. Our app is designed by a team of passionate manga lovers, to provide you with the best reading experience possible. Enjoy seamless navigation and uninterrupted reading, as you immerse yourself in your favorite manga.

Discover the best of manga reading with our app's top features:

-A massive, ever-growing catalog of manga from multiple sources
-New chapters added as soon as they're available
-Super-fast and smooth reading experience
-Personalized daily recommendations on our "Today" home page
-Curated content featuring the most popular manga titles
-Save your favorites and reading progress in one convenient place
-Advanced filtering and search options
-Download manga for offline reading
-Minimal and non-intrusive ads, even in the free version
-Regular updates with new features and improvements

With Manga Reader, you'll have access to the latest and greatest manga titles, as well as hidden gems that you may not have discovered yet. Whether you're a seasoned manga reader or new to the world of manga, our app has everything you need to enjoy the best manga reading experience. Download Manga Reader now and start your manga journey today!

Copyright Policy
We respect the intellectual property rights of others. It is Our policy to respond to any claim that Content posted on the Service infringes a copyright or other intellectual property infringement of any person.

If You are a copyright owner, or authorized on behalf of one, and You believe that the copyrighted work has been copied in a way that constitutes copyright infringement that is taking place through the Service, You must submit Your notice in writing to the attention of our copyright agent via email at jd@nsi.llc and include in Your notice a detailed description of the alleged infringement.
You may be held accountable for damages (including costs and attorneys' fees) for misrepresenting that any Content is infringing Your copyright.

DMCA Notice and DMCA Procedure for Copyright Infringement Claims
You may submit a notification pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) by providing our Copyright Agent with the following information in writing (see 17 U.S.C 512(c)(3) for further detail):
•	An electronic or physical signature of the person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the copyright's interest.
•	A description of the copyrighted work that You claim has been infringed, including the URL (i.e., web page address) of the location where the copyrighted work exists or a copy of the copyrighted work.
•	Identification of the URL or other specific location on the Service where the material that You claim is infringing is located.
•	Your address, telephone number, and email address.
•	A statement by You that You have a good faith belief that the disputed use is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
•	A statement by You, made under penalty of perjury, that the above information in Your notice is accurate and that You are the copyright owner or authorized to act on the copyright owner's behalf.

You can contact our copyright agent via email at jd@nsi.llc. Upon receipt of a notification, the Company will take whatever action, in its sole discretion, it deems appropriate, including removal of the challenged content from the Service.

Read more in our terms of use: https://mangareaderapps.com/terms-and-conditions/
Privacy Policy: https://mangareaderapps.com/privacy-policy/

App requires subscription to read the manga content.

Read the novel and comic version of the hottest anime – Solo Leveling (Only I Level Up)! 

Introducing the all-new WebNovel – your gateway to thrilling adventures! 

Immerse yourself in a world of captivating novels and embark on unforgettable journeys. We're here to redefine the way you experience online reading: Let's read your adventures. 

Discover a treasure trove of novel genres that will transport you to realms beyond your imagination. The library boasts hundreds of thousands of fanfictions, as well as Western fantasy stories where mythical creatures roam and epic quests unfold. Indulge in the allure of Eastern fantasy, with mesmerising tales of wuxia, xianxia, xuanhuan, and more. Lose yourself in the enchantment of fantasy novels that will keep you spellbound from start to finish.

But that's not all—we've got something special for fans of system novels, litRPGs, and progression fantasy. Experience the thrill of leveling up and unlocking new powers alongside your favourite characters as they navigate immersive game-like worlds.

With WebNovel, you have access to a vast library of captivating novels, including our massive collection of hundreds of thousands of fanfics, written by talented authors from around the globe. Our intuitive interface ensures a seamless reading experience, allowing you to immerse yourself fully in every twist and turn.

Start your reading journey today with WebNovel – where every page is an invitation to escape reality and embark on extraordinary quests. Get ready to read your adventures like never before!

Featured genres: Mystery, Eastern Fantasy, Western Fantasy, Sci-fi, Fan-fic, Xianxia, Xuanhuan, Wuxia, Romance, Adventure Mangas, Comics, Manhua, Webtoon

Multiple book genres await you to explore on WebNovel, from epic fantasies to hundreds of thousands of unique fanfictions.

Embark on your spiritual journey with the Ultimate Umrah Guide, an app meticulously crafted to enhance your Umrah experience. Tailored for individuals seeking comprehensive guidance, this app seamlessly combines a concise Umrah guide with authentic dua examples to accompany you at every step.

Duas for Every Step: Explore a rich collection of meticulously curated dua examples to recite at each stage of your Umrah journey. Enhance your connection with the divine through meaningful prayers.

Voice Transcription: Immerse yourself in the spirituality of Umrah with voice/audio transcriptions of all the provided duas. Listen and follow along as you perform each ritual, fostering a deeper connection with your faith.

English Translation: Understand the profound meanings behind the duas with accurate English translations. Gain insights into the spiritual significance of each prayer, fostering a deeper understanding of the rituals.

Multilingual Support: Connect with the divine in your preferred language. Our app is available in multiple languages, ensuring that every user can experience the spiritual journey of Umrah in a language that resonates with them.

Ad-Free Experience: Enjoy an uninterrupted and immersive spiritual experience with our ad-free platform. Your focus should be on the sacred rituals of Umrah, and we ensure a distraction-free environment for your spiritual growth.

Free to Download: Access the complete Umrah guide, dua collection, and all the app features without any cost. We believe in making this spiritual resource freely available to all, fostering inclusivity and accessibility.

Download Now and Begin Your Sacred Journey!

The Ultimate Umrah Guide is designed to be your steadfast companion on this sacred pilgrimage. Download now to access a wealth of knowledge, dua examples, and spiritual guidance. Experience the beauty of Umrah with a user-friendly app that is not only ad-free but also available in multiple languages. May your journey be blessed and spiritually enriching.

Every TaleReader novel delivers an intoxicating escape—whether you crave sizzling chemistry, sweeping love sagas, or twists that leave you breathless.

Download Now & Claim Your Free Story!

Your next obsession is just a tap away. Will you dare to dive in?

CelikTafsir – Tadabbur Al-Qur’an dengan Bahasa Santai

CelikTafsir ialah aplikasi yang membantu anda memahami dan menghayati maksud ayat-ayat Al-Qur’an melalui tafsir yang disampaikan dengan gaya bahasa santai, mudah difahami dan relevan dengan kehidupan seharian.

Qur’an adalah kalam Allah untuk hamba-hambaNya. Sebagai hamba, kita sentiasa dahagakan panduan daripada-Nya dan mencari cara paling praktikal untuk mendalami serta mendekati-Nya.

Aplikasi CelikTafsir dibangunkan dengan harapan agar ia menjadi teman pembimbing rohani yang mudah diakses — di mana sahaja, bila-bila masa. Dengan sokongan teknologi terkini, anda boleh membaca tafsir Qur’an walaupun tanpa sambungan internet.

Ciri-ciri utama CelikTafsir

-Boleh dibaca secara Online & Offline
Muat turun sekali sahaja, dan anda boleh terus membaca tafsir tanpa internet selepas itu.

-Gaya Bahasa Santai & Bersahaja
Tafsir disampaikan dalam bahasa yang dekat dengan kehidupan seharian untuk mudah difahami semua peringkat usia.

-Bookmark Halaman Terakhir Dibaca
Teruskan bacaan anda dari tempat terakhir secara automatik.

-Navigasi Mudah
Bergerak terus ke mana-mana surah dengan pantas.

Sumber Kandungan

Semua isi kandungan aplikasi ini diambil daripada laman web rasmi:
https://celiktafsir.net

My Fiction: Stories & Novels is the premiere app for the best serialized fiction in the world! 

Our stories feature high-stakes drama and heart-stopping romances. From billionaires to bad boys, werewolves to sports stars, My Fiction features the kinds of stories that will sweep you away. Our authors are New York Times and USA Today Bestselling authors, Indie and TikTok superstars and the best emerging authors from across the globe. 

Come discover your next new obsession—we have thousands of books and authors to choose from. Download and start reading for free now!

My Fiction features stories of all genres along with heat levels to match whatever mood you're in. So indulge your fantasies. And be sure to check out some of our fan-favorite stories:

Shifted Fate
Amy was the Luna of her pack, growing a pup in her stomach when the alpha betrayed her and took her life, and that of her pup. When she woke up six years earlier she decided to change everything. Revenge would be something she focused on.

Justice For Juniper
"Your husband cheated with my wife," her boss said. Juniper froze, watching the betrayal on screen, pain tearing through her belly. “My baby...” When she woke again, she saw the three powerful men rushing into her room filled with regret and desire... 

Mated to Two Bad Boy Alphas
Ever since Lia spilled juice on Zane Adams at six, his friends made her life miserable—but when the mysterious Blake shows up to protect her, everything changes. Now, both boys want her…and on her sixteenth birthday, she hears them both growl “mine.” 

Tempting The Mafia Twins
My Mafia husband slept with the woman who killed our baby, and his sister filmed it.  
I tipped off the FBI about his crimes and fled his insane mob family.  
Now, he's locked down the entire city just to hunt me down. 

The Pack's Doctor
Yara is a werewolf, hiding in a human university, studying medicine. One day, when Yara is out letting her wolf run, she comes across Alpha Warren, caught in a bear trap. She saves him, but surprisingly finds out he was her mate.  Warren, a strong and powerful Alpha, finally finds his mate. He's unwilling to let her go, so he took Yara to his pack. 

Want to be part of our Community?
Are you a writer looking for a way to connect with readers? We’re always looking for authors to share their stories. Through our talented team of professional editors, copyeditors, artists and publicists and marketing strategists, we’ll elevate your voice and support your creativity. 

Whether you’re a reader or an author, at My Fiction, you belong.

For news and updates, follow us at:

https://instagram.com/Myfictionapp
https://twitter.com/Myfictionapp

ReadEra - a book reader, allows you to read books for free, text to voice and listen to books for free, offline, in the PDF, EPUB, DOC, DOCX, RTF, MOBI, AZW3, CBZ, CBR, DJVU, FB2, TXT, ODT and CHM formats.

No ads
Read books and listen to books without ads. The ReadEra app for reading books and viewing PDF documents neither contains ads nor imposes internal purchases.

No registration
We’ve made a fast, reliable reader that doesn't compel users to use any specific services. The book reader works offline and is entirely free. Read books for free and listen to books for free (TTS), without limits!

Text to Speech (TTS) 
Read text aloud with voice (TTS) – allows you to read text aloud and listen to all your books, PDF files and documents for free. With the Text to Speech (TTS) function, all your books and documents turn into audiobooks at the tap of the "Read aloud" button. TTS turns your book library into a personal audio library, making reading more flexible and enjoyable. This is especially useful for those who prefer the audio format or want to listen to books in situations where reading is impossible.
You can read foreign books and at the same time listen to the pronunciation of words and sentences. You can choose a voice, adjust the speech speed, turn on repeating text to voice of the selected text, word or sentence. 
Listen to books and documents with ReadEra while doing your things – on the go, working out, before bed and even when sleeping.

Read books of all formats
ReadEra is a set of reading apps in one app, which reads well multiple types of formats: book Epub, Kindle (MOBI, AZW3), Fb2; business PDF, Djvu; office Microsoft Word (DOC, DOCX, RTF), ODT; text TXT and others. Reading books, viewing Microsoft Word documents and PDF files from zip archives.
The reader for books, ReadEra, reads all popular formats of books, journals, articles and other documents in one app.

Best book manager for your library
Auto-detection of books and documents. Grouping books into lists: To Read, Have Read, Favorites. Sorting by name, file format, the last time read, etc. Quickly search for books, PDF files and documents in your library.

Navigation through a book
Quick access to reading settings, table of contents, your bookmarks, quotes, notes and other eBook options. Navigate through the book using the page index or the progress bar line.

Convenient reading settings
Auto-saving the current reading page. Comfortable color themes when reading books: day, night, sepia, console. Horizontal or vertical page flipping mode. Brightness and page margins adjustment, including PDF and DjVu. Separate settings for text and graphic formats. Adjustable type font, size, boldness, line spacing and hyphenation for Microsoft Word, Epub, Kindle (Mobi, Azw3), Fb2, TXT and ODT. Zoom in option for reading PDF and Djvu files.

Quotes and Notes
Create quotes and add notes to text. Highlight text in books, PDF files and documents, add personal notes to the highlighted text. A well-thought-out and simple algorithm for working with quotes and notes. All your quotes and notes in a book are conveniently gathered in one place—in the “About Document” section.

Bookmarks
Add bookmarks to save your favorite spots in books with a single tap. Just tap the upper-right corner while reading to quickly add a bookmark. All bookmarks for the book are conveniently gathered in one place—in the "About Document" section.

Text Translation
ReadEra supports integration with the iOS system “Translate” app for seamless text translation. Instantly translate text in books, PDFs, and documents using the built-in translator on your device.

Read books and Listen to books easily and for free with ReadEra!

Enjoy unlimited access to over 45,000 free audiobooks—stream or download classics anytime. Discover bestsellers, rare treasures, and more in 30+ languages.

Why You’ll Love It

Browse by author, narrator, or genre
Stream unlimited novels, history, poetry, and more
Download for offline listening anywhere
CarPlay support, sleep timer, and bookmarks
Build and explore cozy book collections

A World of Free Listening
Powered by passionate volunteers, LibriVox Audiobooks brings you fresh releases daily—fiction, non-fiction, and out-of-print gems, all at no cost. Start listening now, pause anytime, and pick up right where you left off.

KyBook is the application for reading and cataloging e-books in a modern, user-friendly style. 

KyBook supports all the major e-book formats, OPDS catalogs and Cloud Storage.

Key features
• All the major e-book formats
• OPDS catalogs
• Comfortable reading mode
• Powerful annotations
• Handy cataloguer
• Cloud Storage

Ebook Formats
• EPub (DRM-free)
• PDF (DRM-free)
• MobiPocket and Kindle (mobi, azw3)
• DjVu
• FictionBook (fb2, fb2.zip)
• Comic Book (cbr, cbz, cbt)
• Audio Book (mp3, m4a, m4b)
• Plain and rich text (txt, rtf)

OPDS Catalogs
• Provides access to enormous collection of free electronic books through OPDS-catalogs support.
• Built-in list of well-known OPDS Catalogs
• Allows add own catalog (e.g. Calibre content server)
• Supports for .onion OPDS Catalogs reachable via Tor Network

Comfortable reading mode
• Themes, color schemes for reading (day, night, sepia and more).
• Page turn with scroll, curl and slide.
• Designed to be fast, energy efficient, optimized for very large books (books in millions of words)
• Auto scrolling mode
• Text-to-speech technology to voice any e-book

EPUB/FB2/MOBI specific features
• Customizable font, text size, page margins, paragraph indentation, background and more
• Typography aware (hanging punctuation, hyphenations and more)

PDF/DJVU specific features
• Crops a page margins in manual and automatic mode
• Smart zooming by double-tap
• PDF Reflow on iPhone
• Page text recognition (OCR)

Powerful annotations
• Marked text and bookmarks
• Drawn annotations in any ebook (Apple Pencil support and just by touching).
• Annotations exports in Markdown, HTML, PDF, RTF formats.

Built-in the summary editor
• Markdown formatting.
• Exports summaries in Markdown, HTML, PDF, RTF formats.

Working with fragments of text
• Translation of separate words or complete sentences in different languages.
• Search for a word definition in dictionaries.
• Custom dictionaries in Dictd, StarDict and Lingvo DSL format
• Full text searching in a book (textual, fuzzy and search using regular expressions).
• Built-in search for a selected text on the Internet or Wikipedia.

Handy cataloguer
• Grouping by categories: by authors, subjects, sequences, publishers, tags, popular, recent, new, unread, reading and finished.
• Tags and collections to categorize ebooks.
• Search for books in the library and anywhere in the Internet.
• Own folders tree and flexible bookshelf settings for layout and sorting.
• Arranging books on a bookshelf by dragging.

Working with a metadata and a table of contents
• Automated extraction of a metadata from ebooks.
• Convenient editing of a metadata.
• Editing and creation (automatic or manual) of a table of contents.

File Storage
• Locally on the device.
• In the Cloud Storage (iCloud Drive, Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox, Yandex Disk).
• In the Local network on Shared Folders (SMB/CIFS) or on WebDAV server
• Transparent caching of books in the Internet or Local network.
• Supports of streaming audio books in Cloud Storage.
• Content Server for accessing files on the device via a WiFi.

Synchronization (requires subscription)
• Syncs all ebooks metadata and files.

You will be charged for the regular price of your subscription within 24 hours prior to the end of the current term. You can turn off automatic renewal in your iTunes account settings at any time, but you must do so at least 24 hours before the end of the current term. Refunds will not be provided for the unused portion of any term.

Want to strengthen your connection with the Quran? Try our Al Quran app, used by over 13 million people worldwide.

Understand the Quran in your language with Tafsir. Listen to recitations and explore word-by-word meanings and grammar. Search, bookmark, take notes, and track your progress for deeper study.

Listen to beautiful recitations by your favourite Qaris, follow along with tajweed, and read from familiar Mushaf pages, all in one app. This app is completely free with no ads!

Let’s explore how this easy-to-use Quran app will help you connect with the Quran more meaningfully.

Translations, Tafsirs and Surah Info
- Understand the Quran by studying 170+ Translations & Tafsirs of the Quran in 60+ languages: English, Indonesian, Bangla, Hindi, Urdu, German, Chinese, French, Italian, Malay, Russian, Spanish, Tamil, and many more!
- 8 Arabic Tafsirs (including Tafseer Ibn Kathir, Tafseer Tabari, etc.) along with Arabic E3rab, Word Meaning, Asbabun Nuzul
- Surah info: Surah summary and virtues

Word by Word Analysis & Translations
- Read Word by Word translations of the Quran in English, Indonesian, Bangla, German, Hindi, Ingush, Malay, Russian, Tamil, Turkish and Urdu
- Study and analyse Word Root/Lemma, Grammar, Morphology, Occurrences in different forms and Verb Forms to dive in more depth. Helpful to learn & understand Quranic Arabic

Mushaf Mode
- Recite Quran in Mushaf mode to have the same experience when reciting from a hard-copy Mushaf
- Available Mushaf scripts: Madani, Naskh Indopak, Qaloon, Shemerly, Warsh

Library: Bookmarks & Notes
- Bookmark ayahs to your own Collections and keep track of the last read ayah using Pins
- Start reading from where you left off using auto Last Reads
- Reflect and take notes for each ayah (آية)
- Sync library across multiple devices and even share with others using import/export

Search & Quran Subject-wise Topics
- Powerful Search with highlights to quickly find what you are looking for
- Explore by Topics & read the ayahs related to a topic together

Quran Audio
- Listen to Quran recitations by 80+ reciters with Quran audio translation in 10+ languages (downloadable for offline use)
- Reciter Options: Mishary Al Afasy, Husary, Ayman Suwaid, Abdur Rahman As-Sudais and many others
- Powerful Audio System with repeat, group playback of verses function to aid in Quran Memorisation/Quran Hifz
- Reciters tagged based on recitation types: Murattal, Mujawwad, Translation
- Arabic Audio Commentary and Quran audio translation in Bangla, English, Urdu others

Quran Planner, Streak and Badges
- Plan your Khatmah of the Quran using the Quran Planner
- Set your daily reading target, track and increase it gradually
- Monitor your weekly activity
- Build a daily Quran reading habit using Streak
- Earn badges for completing Streak Milestones and exploring app features

Various Customisation Options, Tajweed & Others
- Read in Uthmanic or Indopak script
- Read Tafsirs in Tafsir view
- Recite Tajweed colour-coded Quran with ease
- Quran Dictionary: See the list of roots for different Arabic alphabets
- Various fonts and multiple themes, including Night mode
- Autoscroll feature
- Copy & Share the verses
- All feature supports offline (Quran offline)

15+ Languages
- Arabic, English, Bangla, German, French, Bahasa Indonesia / Malay, Russian, Spanish, Tagalog, Turkish, Urdu, and more

Download the ad-free Quran app and start your journey to a deeper understanding of the Quran!

Meloshort: Your Ultimate Destination for Popular Short Dramas and Must-Watch Mini-Series

In today’s fast-paced world, finding time to unwind and enjoy quality entertainment can be a challenge. That’s where Meloshort comes in — the ultimate app designed specifically for busy viewers like you, who crave engaging stories but have limited time. With episodes lasting just 1 to 2 minutes, Meloshort offers a vast and diverse library of popular short dramas and must-watch mini-series that perfectly fit into your fragmented schedule.
Whether you are commuting, grabbing a quick coffee break, or just squeezing in some entertainment between daily tasks, Meloshort lets you dive into cinematic-quality storytelling anytime, anywhere. Experience the grandeur of ancient costume dramas, the sweetness and charm of modern romances, the thrill of intense boss hero stories, or the gripping suspense of revenge thrillers — all in beautifully produced HD formats that bring these worlds to life on your screen.

Diverse Genres to Match Every Mood
Our ever-expanding collection covers a rich variety of genres, ensuring there is something for everyone:
- Sweet Pet Romance: Heartwarming stories filled with adorable love and tender moments.
- Emotional Sadomasochistic Passion: Complex, intense relationships full of raw emotion and drama.
- Thrilling Suspense Mysteries: Edge-of-your-seat narratives packed with twists and turns.
- Heartfelt Campus Stories: Relatable tales of youth, friendship, and first love.
- Urban Emotional Dramas: Deeply engaging stories that explore the complexities of modern city life.
With new episodes and series added every week, your watchlist will never run dry. Our smart recommendation engine learns your tastes and suggests fresh content tailored just for you, helping you discover your next favorite popular short drama or must-watch mini-series effortlessly.

Features Tailored for Your Viewing Pleasure
Meloshort isn’t just about great stories — it’s about making your viewing experience smooth, personalized, and enjoyable. Some of our key features include:
- Playback Speed Control: Adjust episode speed to match your viewing pace — slow down to savor moments or speed up when you’re short on time.
- Personal Watchlist: Easily organize and keep track of all the mini-series you want to watch.
- User-Friendly Interface: Navigate effortlessly through a sleek, intuitive design with stunning HD visuals that make every episode a pleasure to watch.

Global Appeal and Accessibility
Recognizing the global audience we serve, Meloshort supports:
- Multilingual Subtitles: Catering to viewers worldwide by providing subtitles in multiple languages.
- Localized Dubbing: Enjoy your favorite dramas in your native language with high-quality dubbing options.
From palace intrigues and CEO romances to campus crushes and emotional urban tales, Meloshort delivers a rich tapestry of stories that resonate across cultures and geographies.

Why Choose Meloshort?
- Optimized for Busy Lives: Episodes last just 1-2 minutes, perfect for watching on the go or during short breaks.
- High-Quality Content: Each drama is carefully selected or produced with cinematic quality, offering you an immersive viewing experience.
- Constantly Updated Library: Fresh content added weekly keeps the excitement alive and your watchlist full.
- Smart Recommendations: Our intelligent algorithm helps you find exactly the kinds of shows you’ll love.

Download Meloshort Today!
Join millions of viewers worldwide who have made Meloshort their go-to app for bite-sized entertainment. Experience fast, high-quality storytelling designed perfectly for your busy lifestyle. Download Meloshort now, start exploring the hottest popular short dramas and must-watch mini-series, and never miss a moment of great storytelling again!

description:
起点中文网官方移动端app，畅享正版原创网文，加入书友圈，和原创作家近距离互动。

【免费读书】免费新书热书天天送，让你根本停不下来！
【活动中心】精彩活动集结，边玩边赚钱，福利不停歇；

………………起点读书 • 热门原著………………

Literie is a doorway to endless literary worlds.  With an extensive selection of genres, from feel-good romances to dramatic fantasies, Literie offers something for every reader.  Whether you’re diving into a new book by a rising author or revisiting a favorite from a seasoned writer, Literie delivers the stories you love, all in one app.

Browse through captivating books and immerse yourself in the fiction that speaks to you.  Whether it's teen lit, chick lit, or anything in between, Literie brings all your favorite genres to your fingertips.

Powered by Letterlux, a creative hub for emerging and established authors, Literie offers exclusive content that’s crafted to inspire and entertain.  If you're passionate about writing, you can even apply to become a Letterlux signed author through the link: https://letterlux.tech/ and share your book with the Literie community.

Whatever your literary desires, Literie is here to satisfy them—one story at a time.

Subscription Agreement
1.Period：monthly(auto-renewable subscriptions)
2.Price：US$19.99/month, US$49.99/month
3. Payment: The purchase will be charged to your iTunes account.
4. Renewal: The Apple iTunes account will automatically deduct fees within 24 hours before the subscription expires. After successful deduction, the subscription will be postponed for one cycle.
5. Cancel：You can cancel your subscription at any time 24 hours before the subscription expires.
6. Manage subscriptions: You can view and manage your renewals.
7. Award：After subscribing, the coins and vouchers received each month are limited. If you need more coins, please make an additional recharge.

MANGA Plus by SHUEISHA, is the official manga reading service from Shueisha, that provides you with the latest chapters for free at the same time as in Japan. Immerse yourself in binge-worthy and anime-adapted comics like; One Piece, Chainsaw Man, Boruto: Two Blue Vortex, Jujutsu Kaisen, My Hero Academia, 【OSHI NO KO】, Dandadan and Red Cat Ramen.

Enjoy the first three and newest three chapters for FREE. Want to catch up on SPY x FAMILY, Kaiju No.8 (Monster #8), and Kagurabachi? You can read all chapters of currently ongoing manga in English once for free! Some titles are also available in other languages, including Spanish, Thai, Portuguese, Indonesian, Russian, French, German, and Vietnamese*. Available titles may vary by language and region.

Want unlimited reading with no ads? MANGA Plus MAX is just for you! Access over 17,000 chapters in English from anywhere in the world*. Standard Plan will keep you up to date with current ongoing comics. Upgrade to the Deluxe Plan to dive into current comics as well as completed classics like Dragon Ball, NARUTO, BLEACH, Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba, Death Note, Tokyo Ghoul, Haikyuu! and Bakuman.! *Unavailable in Japan, China, and Korea. Prices and available titles vary by country/region. Only English titles are available in the subscription plan.

Using this official service means that your support goes directly to the creators who work tirelessly to bring you new stories.

Download now and embark on a journey through captivating narratives, with fresh chapters waiting for you every day!

Welcome to Webfic - Fantastic Reading, your passport to a world of enchanting tales and captivating narratives! Dive into a universe of words, where extraordinary stories await your exploration. This immersive online reading app is designed to transport you to far-off realms and tantalize your imagination with a vast collection of web novels.  

Webfic is a reading app with massive original English stories, including urban, romance, fantasy, werewolf, classic, and so on. With Webfic - Fantastic Reading, your online reading experience will never be the same again. Imagine being able to embark on thrilling adventures, unravel mysteries, and fall in love with characters, all from the convenience of your mobile device. 

Highlights

- Immersive Stories & Personalized Recommendations
Delve into a treasure trove of web novels that spans multiple genres, from heartwarming romances to suspenseful mysteries and epic fantasies. Our carefully curated library has something for every reader, ensuring you'll never run out of captivating tales to explore. And Webfic's intuitive recommendation system can help you discover more free stories that align with your interests. Whether you're a fan of billionaires, dramas, or romance, Webfic has a story waiting just for you.

- Customizable Reading Experience
One of the key features of Webfic is the ability to customize the reading experience. Users can adjust the background color, font size, and brightness to suit their preferences, ensuring optimal comfort for their eyes. Whether you prefer reading in the daytime or under the covers with a flashlight, Webfic accommodates your unique reading style. This level of personalization enhances the overall reading experience and sets Webfic apart from other free reading apps.

- Offline Reading & Regular Updates.
No internet? No problem! Download your favorite stories and read them offline, perfect for those times when you're on the go or just want to escape into a world of words without any distractions. Stories on Webfic are updated frequently, so you'll never have to wait long for the next chapter or episode. Say goodbye to cliffhangers that keep you waiting in suspense!


Key Features
- Get real-time recommendations of original free stories according to your preferences.
- Have a wonderful reading experience through the function of adjusting the background color.
- Save your favorite stories in the library to keep the latest chapter with you wherever you go.

Webfic is not just a reading app, it's a gateway to new worlds, a source of inspiration, and a community of book lovers coming together to celebrate the joy of reading. Escape reality for a while and explore the vast realms of fiction that are just a tap away. 

So, what are you waiting for? Start your journey with Webfic - Fantastic Reading today and unlock the door to a world of limitless storytelling possibilities. Whether you're a seasoned bookworm or just looking for an escape from the ordinary, Webfic welcomes you with open arms. Webfic - Fantastic Reading is a free reading app to use. If you want, you can also subscribe to unlock all the good novels for free.
